meanings.sent1: She outblushing her friend when she received a compliment.
meanings.sent2: The shy girl was outblushing everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected praise made her outblushing with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were outblushing the roses in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The embarrassing moment left her outblushing for hours.

meanings.definition: To cause to blush more intensely than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: His teasing remarks always outblushing his sister.
meanings.sent2: The romantic gesture outblushing her with its sweetness.
meanings.sent3: The playful banter managed to outblushing even the most stoic person.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected compliment outblushing all previous compliments.
meanings.sent5: The embarrassing mix-up left him outblushing the entire room.
